name: List
title: Gcloud
ResourceManager
Project
List
description: Project::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
ResourceManager
Project
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more projects that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
ResourceManager
Project
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more projects that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
ResourceManager
Project
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of projects.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
resource_manager = gcloud.resource_manager

projects = resource_manager.projects
if projects.next?
  next_projects = projects.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
resource_manager = gcloud.resource_manager

projects = resource_manager.projects
if projects.next?
  next_projects = projects.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
ResourceManager
Project
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all projects by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each project, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all projects are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each project by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
resource_manager = gcloud.resource_manager
projects = resource_manager.projects

projects.all do |project|
  puts project.project_id
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
resource_manager = gcloud.resource_manager
projects = resource_manager.projects

all_project_ids = projects.all.map do |project|
  project.project_id
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
resource_manager = gcloud.resource_manager
projects = resource_manager.projects

projects.all(request_limit: 10) do |project|
  puts project.project_id
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all projects. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each project.
